titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation for the discovery and apprehending of high-way-men and robbers, and for a reward to the discoverers
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the eighth day of July, 1689. In the first year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
